content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. So, what price are you considering for this modern, centrally located space?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. I'd like to propose 500 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 500 Euro per month is a very reasonable offer. However, considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I'm sure we can find a price that reflects its true value. Would you be willing to negotiate a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location and quality of the apartment are exceptional. How about 525 Euro per month? This would still be a good deal for both parties. What is your counter-offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer of 525 Euro per month is quite attractive. However, I believe that the apartment's proximity to all amenities and its brand-new condition justify a slightly higher price. Would you consider 550 Euro per month? This would be a fair reflection of the market value for such a property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your expertise in real estate is evident. I respect your knowledge and the quality of the apartment you're offering. I'm willing to go up to 575 Euro per month. This would be my final offer. What do you say?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer of 575 Euro per month shows that you are indeed serious about the apartment. While it's a strong offer, I must insist that the true market value for this apartment is 600 Euro per month. This would be an excellent deal for you, considering the convenience and luxury of the location. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your confidence in the value of this apartment is commendable. However, as a student, I must be mindful of my budget. I'm sorry, but I cannot agree to 600 Euro per month. I'll have to pass on this opportunity. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price exceeds my budget. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
